name: Amazing Thief Mouse Jump: Don't Trip and Fall
name_original: Amazing Thief Mouse Jump: Don't Trip and Fall
description:
Do you like playing fun, simple games that remind you of the classics? Then you'll love this one! Aim high as you jump your way to the top, testing your dexterity and timing. You'll want to play over and over again to push yourself to your limits as you try and beat your previous score.

The app doesn't have to be complicated to be fun. As you try to climb upwards, there's always something getting in your way. It's up to you to get your timing right and jump on the next object that will take you closer to the top. Don't wait too long to jump or else you might fall to your death!

With its fast pace and fun graphics it's challenging enough for even the toughest critics. But it's also an app that's fun for the whole family as everyone attempts to outdo each other's scores. Don't wait; download today! Put your jumping skills to the test!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
